xml.data:
Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 3 Āsavagocchaka » 3.5 Āsavaāsavasampayuttaduka » 3.5.7 Pañhāvāra » 3.5.7.1 Paccayānuloma » 3.5.7.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Kammādi
Āsavagocchaka
Āsavaāsavasampayuttaduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Kammādi
123.
1302Āsavasampayutto ceva no ca āsavo dhammo āsavasampayuttassa ceva no ca āsavassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi…  āhārapaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi…  indriyapaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi…  jhānapaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi…  maggapaccayena paccayo…  nava…  sampayuttapaccayena paccayo…  nava…  atthipaccayena paccayo…  natthipaccayena paccayo…  vigatapaccayena paccayo…  avigatapaccayena paccayo…  nava.
<< Ārammaṇādiup3.5.7.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāra >>
